title: The Letter: a film about legal rights
creator_credit: Film Victoria, Legal Aid Commission of Victoria, Richard Jones and Aleksi Vellis
brief_description: A guide to the basic legal rights, entitlements and responsibilities for people living in Australia, in particular for non-English speaking migrants. The film explores the laws relating to business, presumption of innocence, issues related to employee/employer relations, financial support, racism, anti-discrimination and tenancy laws. The film illustrates differences between legal rights in Australia and in other countries.
